data.text:
Karl August Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach1

M, #110801, b. 31 July 1844, d. 20 November 1894

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=9.58%

Karl August Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach was born on 31 July 1844 at Weimar, Germany .2 He was the son of Karl Alexander August Johann Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Wilhelmine Marie Sophie Luise von Nassau, Princess of the Netherlands.1 He married Pauline Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, daughter of Hermann Bernhard Georg Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Auguste Wilhelmine Henriette Prinzessin von Württemberg, on 26 August 1873 at Friedrichshafen, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2 He died on 20 November 1894 at age 50 at Cap Martin, France .1

He gained the title of Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach (styled as Hereditary Grand Duke of Saxe-Weimar-Eisenach.1)

Children of Karl August Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Pauline Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach

Wilhelm Ernst Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach+2 b. 10 Jun 1876, d. 24 Apr 1923

Bernhard Karl Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach2 b. 18 Apr 1880, d. 1 Oct 1900

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 252. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 253.

Pauline Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach1

F, #110802, b. 25 July 1852, d. 17 May 1904

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=1.66%

Pauline Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach was born on 25 July 1852 at Stuttgart, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2 She was the daughter of Hermann Bernhard Georg Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Auguste Wilhelmine Henriette Prinzessin von Württemberg.2 She married Karl August Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, son of Karl Alexander August Johann Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Wilhelmine Marie Sophie Luise von Nassau, Princess of the Netherlands, on 26 August 1873 at Friedrichshafen, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2 She died on 17 May 1904 at age 51 at Orte, Italy .2

She gained the title of Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach.1 She was given the name of Pauline Ida Marie Olga Henriette Katherine von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach at birth.

Children of Pauline Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Karl August Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach

Wilhelm Ernst Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach+2 b. 10 Jun 1876, d. 24 Apr 1923

Bernhard Karl Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach2 b. 18 Apr 1880, d. 1 Oct 1900

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 252. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 253.

Marie Alexandrine Anne Sophie Auguste Helene Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach1

F, #110803, b. 20 January 1849, d. 6 May 1922

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=9.58%

Marie Alexandrine Anne Sophie Auguste Helene Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach was born on 20 January 1849 at Weimar, Germany .2 She was the daughter of Karl Alexander August Johann Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Wilhelmine Marie Sophie Luise von Nassau, Princess of the Netherlands.1 She married Heinrich VII Prinz Reuss zu Köstritz, son of Heinrich LXIII Fürst Reuss zu Köstritz and Eleonore Gräfin zu Stolberg-Wernigerode, on 6 February 1876 at Weimar, Germany .2 She died on 6 May 1922 at age 73 at Trebschen .2

She gained the title of Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach.1

Children of Marie Alexandrine Anne Sophie Auguste Helene Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Heinrich VII Prinz Reuss zu Köstritz

Heinrich XXXII Prinz Reuss zu Köstritz2 b. 4 Mar 1878, d. 6 May 1935

Heinrich XXXIII Prinz Reuss zu Köstritz+3 b. 26 Jul 1879, d. 15 Nov 1942

Johanna Prinzessin Reuss zu Köstritz b. 8 Jun 1882, d. 15 Jun 1883

Sophie Renate Prinzessin Reuss zu Köstritz+4 b. 27 Jun 1884, d. 19 Jan 1968

Heinrich XXXV Prinz Reuss zu Köstritz+3 b. 1 Aug 1887, d. 17 Jan 1936

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 252. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 340.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 342.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 341.

Heinrich XX Prinz Reuss zu Greiz1

M, #110804, b. 29 June 1794, d. 8 November 1859

Last Edited=2 Nov 2012

Consanguinity Index=0.01%

Heinrich XX Prinz Reuss zu Greiz was born on 29 June 1794 at Offenbach, Germany .2 He was the son of Heinrich XIII Fürst Reuss zu Greiz and Luise Prinzessin von Nassau-Weilburg.1 He married, firstly, Sophie Prinzessin zu Löwenstein-Wertheim-Rosenberg on 25 November 1834.2 He married, secondly, Karoline Prinzessin von Hessen-Homburg, daughter of Gustav Prinz von Hessen-Homburg and Luise Prinzessin von Anhalt-Dessau, on 1 October 1839 at Hamburg, Germany .2 He died on 8 November 1859 at age 65 at Greiz, Sachsen, Germany .2

Children of Heinrich XX Prinz Reuss zu Greiz and Karoline Prinzessin von Hessen-Homburg

Hermine Prinzessin Reuss zu Greiz+2 b. 25 Dec 1840, d. 4 Jan 1890

Heinrich XXI Prinz Reuss zu Greiz2 b. 11 Feb 1844, d. 14 Jun 1844

Heinrich XXII Prinz Reuss zu Greiz+2 b. 28 Mar 1846, d. 19 Apr 1902

Heinrich XXIII Prinz Reuss zu Greiz2 b. 27 Jun 1848, d. 22 Oct 1861

Marie Prinzessin Reuss zu Greiz2 b. 19 Mar 1855, d. 31 Dec 1909

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 334. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 335.

Anne Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach1

F, #110805, b. 29 March 1851, d. 26 April 1859

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=9.58%

Anne Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach was born on 29 March 1851 at Weimar, Germany .1 She was the daughter of Karl Alexander August Johann Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Wilhelmine Marie Sophie Luise von Nassau, Princess of the Netherlands.1 She died on 26 April 1859 at age 8 at Weimar, Germany .1 She was also reported to have died on 26 May 1859 at Weimar, Germany .

She gained the title of Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach.1

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 252. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Elisabeth Sybille Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach1

F, #110806, b. 28 February 1854, d. 10 July 1908

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=9.58%

Elisabeth Sybille Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach was born on 28 February 1854 at Weimar, Germany .2 She was the daughter of Karl Alexander August Johann Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Wilhelmine Marie Sophie Luise von Nassau, Princess of the Netherlands.1 She married Johann Albrecht Herzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin, son of Friedrich Franz II Großherzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Auguste Prinzessin Reuss zu Köstritz, on 6 November 1886 at Weimar, Germany .2 She died on 10 July 1908 at age 54 at Wiligard .2

She was given the name of Elisabeth Sybille Marie Dorothea Luise Anne Amalie von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach at birth. She gained the title of Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach.1

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 252. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 421.

Johann Albrecht Herzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin1

M, #110807, b. 8 December 1857, d. 16 February 1920

Last Edited=30 Nov 2007

Consanguinity Index=0.1%

Johann Albrecht Herzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin was born on 8 December 1857 at Schwerin, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany .2 He was the son of Friedrich Franz II Großherzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Auguste Prinzessin Reuss zu Köstritz.3 He married, firstly, Elisabeth Sybille Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, daughter of Karl Alexander August Johann Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Wilhelmine Marie Sophie Luise von Nassau, Princess of the Netherlands, on 6 November 1886 at Weimar, Germany .2 He married, secondly, Elisabeth Prinzessin zu Stolberg-Rossla, daughter of Botho Fürst zu Stolberg-Rossla and Hedwig Prinzessin zu Ysenburg und Büdingen, on 15 December 1909.2 He died on 16 February 1920 at age 62 at Wiligard .2

He gained the title of Herzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin (styled as Duke of Mecklenburg-Schwerin.1)

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 252. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 421.

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings, volume 1, page 416.

Karoline Prinzessin Reuss zu Greiz1

F, #110808, b. 13 July 1884, d. 17 January 1905

Last Edited=2 Nov 2012

Consanguinity Index=0.86%

Karoline Prinzessin Reuss zu Greiz was born on 13 July 1884 at Greiz, Sachsen, Germany .1 She was the daughter of Heinrich XXII Prinz Reuss zu Greiz and Ida Mathilde Adelheid Prinzessin zu Schaumburg-Lippe.1 She married Wilhelm Ernst Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, son of Karl August Erbherzöge von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Pauline Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, on 30 April 1903 at Bückeburg, Niedersachsen, Germany .1 She died on 17 January 1905 at age 20 at Meiningen, Thüringen, Germany .1

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 253. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Auguste Wilhelmine Henriette Prinzessin von Württemberg1

F, #110809, b. 4 October 1826, d. 3 December 1898

Last Edited=20 Mar 2012

Consanguinity Index=8.67%

Auguste Wilhelmine Henriette Prinzessin von Württemberg was born on 4 October 1826 at Stuttgart, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2 She was the daughter of Wilhelm I König von Württemberg and Pauline Therese Herzogin von Württemberg. She married Hermann Bernhard Georg Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, son of Karl Bernhard Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Ida Prinzessin von Sachsen-Meiningen, on 17 June 1851 at Friedrichshafen, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2 She died on 3 December 1898 at age 72 at Stuttgart, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2

Children of Auguste Wilhelmine Henriette Prinzessin von Württemberg and Hermann Bernhard Georg Prinz von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach
